import "./AddEventForm.css"; import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Form, Col, Row, Button, FloatingLabel, FormControl, } from "react-bootstrap"; const AddEventForm = () => { const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); const enteredSport = useRef(); const enteredLevel = useRef(); const enteredNrOfPlayers = useRef(); const enteredLvlRequirement = useRef(); const enteredCity = useRef(); const enteredLocation = useRef(); const enteredDate = useRef(); const enteredTime = useRef(); const enteredDescription = useRef(); const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); } setValidated(true); event.preventDefault(); const newEvent = { sport : enteredSport.current.value, enteredLevel, enteredNrOfPlayers, enteredLvlRequirement, enteredCity, enteredLocation, enteredDate, enteredTime, enteredDescription, }; console.log(newEvent) }; return (
City Please provide a valid city. You can specify a place Start date of the event Start time of the event
); }; export default AddEventForm; /* Username @ Please choose a username. */
